tracks.text: Snow falls on him as he gets the paper
The Don looks at a dead fish in an aquarium.
The Don knocks a radio into the aquarium. Jimmy dives, pulling the plug.
The Don steps on his pet lion's tail. The lion rears, Jimmy points a gun, and the lion sits, glares, and flips Jimmy off.

He opens the window. Jimmy pulls him from the window, as a bolt flies into the room, ricochets, hits the record player, and bounces around the room. Jimmy and the Don dance in the style of the Tango to avoid it.
The Don has a rose in his mouth. The lightning ignites Jimmy's cigar.
Jimmy narrows his eyes
Petey and Jimmy sit in a car at a stop sign in farm country.
Jimmy opens a panel beside the steering wheel, and presses 2 exposed wires together.
They fly backwards, ramming a white car behind them.
They watch behind them as the car flies backwards down the road, through a fence, and into a ditch.
A flash of white light fades into a mushroom cloud behind them.
A man with graying hair climbs out of the ditch
An elaborate, futuristic mansion
A crane holds a tall statue of an armless man with a 6 foot long penis.
Cookie retrieves mail from the mailbox.
McCool summersaults off Horse. Typed text appears, RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool.
Gina jumps from a tree, spins around the statue penis, and lands in front of McCool.
McCool rides off
At the Wheaton mansion
They enter a room with a rock climbing wall. An airplane and a kayak dangle from the cieling.
Jimmy runs, jumps through a window, lands in his car, and drives off.
At the house. Theresa paints her nails in her room. Gina enters.
A sleek yellow sports car pulls up in front of the house.
Petey drives with Wheaton. He drives on the 2 right wheels, turns around, then drives only on the back wheels, then on the front bumper, then flies it through the air. Jimmy and Cookie gape.
He drives donuts in the street.
Petey gets out. A 4 man pit crew approaches with oil and gas, make adjustments, then run.
Petey and Wheaton get in and they drive off.
The family sits at the dining room table.
Wheaton descends into the back yard with a jetpack.
Petey gets up from the table and puts on a pack with Wheaton. The 2 fly off.
At the Canada Department of Health, Welfare and other Handouts
Theresa and Gina sit in matching outfits.
She plumps her hair and chest.
The 2 walk hand in hand
A man leads a crying woman in handcuffs
An army man pistol whips a child, who collapses in his own blood on the floor. The man smiles. Theresa and Gina recoil.
At the house. Jimmy stirs a red sauce in a pot. The counters are covered in red splatters and hand prints.
Theresa sits alone at a table under a spotlight.
A man in a brown coat throws a file on the table.
Theresa shakes her head.
They pass a window where Gina sits with her feet up and a man cries in the corner.
At the Wheaton mansion
Jimmy rolls up his sleeves, revealing a tattoo of a falcon wielding a tommy gun.
Outside a room with posters of gangsters, bullet ridden cars, and weapons in display cases.
Behind him is a poster of himself with the same expression.
His saddle horn glistens
Gina looks at the baby bonus check for $104.66
Gina crumples the check and tosses it
Petey types at his computer
Jimmy and Wheaton walk in an expanse of snow
Images of family appear
Theresa and a man kiss
He falls in an ice fishing hole
Jimmy looks around and kicks a circle of ice into the hole, covering it.
